slider1.title: Milling Equipments
slider1.subtitle: Milling equipments refers to industrial machines used for grinding, cutting, and breaking down materials into finer particles. These machines are essential in industries such as food processing, mining, and construction for precise size reduction of various products.

slider2.title: Feed Milling Equipments
slider2.subtitle: Feed milling equipment is specialized machinery used to grind, mix, and process raw ingredients into animal feed. These machines ensure the production of high-quality, uniform feed, vital for livestock nutrition in agriculture and farming industries.

slider3.title: Automation Systems
slider3.subtitle: Automation systems use technology to perform tasks with minimal human input, improving efficiency and reducing errors in industries like manufacturing and logistics.

slider4.title: GLB SÄ°LO
slider4.subtitle: Grain storage and transportation systems are designed to safely store and move harvested grains. These systems ensure the protection and efficient handling of grain from farms to processing facilities.

slider5.title: Seed Cleaning Technologies
slider5.subtitle: Seed cleaning technologies are specialized equipment used to remove impurities and unwanted materials from seeds. They ensure high-quality, pure seeds for planting or processing in agriculture.

slider6.title: Ektar Truck Scales
slider6.subtitle: Truck scales are large weighing platforms designed to measure the weight of vehicles and their loads. They are essential for industries like transportation, agriculture, and construction to ensure accurate weight measurements and compliance with regulations.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: EKMAR GROUP specializes in grain and oilseed storage systems with over 20 years of experience. The company provides consulting, design, and project management, offering turnkey solutions. EKMAR prioritizes quality and long-term customer partnerships.

expertManufacturer.title: Expert Manufacturer
expertManufacturer.subtitle: EKMAR GROUP specializes in grain and oilseed storage and transportation systems manufacturing, also providing spare parts supply.

twentyYearsExperience.title: 20 Years of Experience
twentyYearsExperience.subtitle: With over 20 years of experience, the company offers consulting, design, and project management services for both domestic and international projects.

leadershipGoal.title: Leadership Goal
leadershipGoal.subtitle: The company aims to be a leader in helping customers succeed by offering superior services compared to competitors.

reliablePartner.title: Reliable Partner
reliablePartner.subtitle: EKMAR GROUP's mission is to be a reliable, long-term partner, focusing on continuous improvement and fostering a positive culture for partners and employees.

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.subtitle: If you are interested in becoming a partner or sponsor, please feel free to contact us.

offers.title: What We Offer
offers.subtitle: Our professional services include expert guidance and thorough control and supervision. We ensure high-quality standards throughout your project. After the warranty period, our post-warranty service provides continued support and maintenance.

determiningNeeds.title: Determining Needs
determiningNeeds.subtitle: As a result of constant contact with our customers, carried out by our experienced staff, the needs of the Customer are determined and offered by informing and presenting the choice of product, block diagram and layouts for the relevant purposes.

design.title: Design
design.subtitle: Technological schemes and rough drawings of projects are prepared free of charge in accordance with the identified and agreed needs for our clients. As a result, if the projects are agreed, the pricing phase begins.

createInfrastructure.title: We Create Infrastructure
createInfrastructure.subtitle: At the request of our customers, we can provide professional services for the construction of foundations and installation of equipment.

controlAndSupervision.title: Control and Supervision
controlAndSupervision.subtitle: Our control and supervision mechanism is fully implemented in every step from design stage, shipment, delivery, assembly, commissioning to production stages, which minimizes errors.

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.subtitle: With quality, continuity, reliability, professional service support, qualified service technicians and spare parts guarantees, customer satisfaction is maintained at the highest level.

postWarrantyService.title: Post-Warranty Service
postWarrantyService.subtitle: Post-warranty service is a great option for equipment owners who want to get the most out of their investment. With us, you can be sure that your equipment will operate efficiently and reliably throughout its entire service life.
